name: Blur + Smooth Duo
about: What it is:A smoothing and hydrating duo with encapsulated BHA and hyaluronic acid to visibly blur texture, refine the look of pores over time, and balance oil for a soft-focus finish..Skin Type:Normal, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Uneven Texture, Pores, and Oiliness.Highlighted Ingredients:- Encapsulated BHA and Strawberry Enzyme: Smooth the look of uneven texture over time..Ingredient Callouts:These products are gluten-free, cruelty-free, and come in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This skin-prepping duo features Blur Drops, which visibly reduces pore size and control oil with pore-blurring tapioca and rice, and oil-free Pink Juice Moisturizer, which includes watermelon extract & hyaluronic acid to calm, hydrate, and brighten skin..This Set Contains:- 1.01 oz/ 30 mL Strawberry BHA Pore-Smooth Blur Drops.Clinical Results:In a 2-week consumer-perception study of 35 subjects who used the Strawberry BHA Pore-Smooth Blur Drops:
ingredients: -Encapsulated BHA and Strawberry Enzyme: Smooth the look of uneven texture over time..-Watermelon Extract: Hydrates, delivers essential vitamins, and contains soothing properties..-Tapioca and Rice: Visibly reduce pore size and allow for a smooth makeup application...Strawberry BHA Pore-Smooth Blur Drops:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Tapioca Starch, Isopentyldiol, Nylon-12, C9-12 Alkane, Distarch Phosphate, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Saccharide Isomerate, Fragaria Vesca (Strawberry) Leaf Extract, Salicylic Acid, Salix Alba Bark Extract, Fragaria Vesca (Strawberry) Fruit Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Bisabolol, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Triheptanoin, Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Propanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Polyglyceryl-10 Dioleate, Dilinoleic Acid/Butanediol Copolymer, Polyglyceryl-10 Dipalmitate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hydroxide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Castor Oil/IPDI Copolymer, Citric Acid, Fragrance/Parfum...Watermelon Glow Pink Juice Oil-Free Moisturizer:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Propanediol, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Ethyl Olivate, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Glycerin, Paeonia Suffruticosa Root Extract, Cetearyl Olivate, Glutamic Acid, Sorbitan Olivate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Jasminum Grandiflorum (Jasmine) Flower Wax, Cetyl Alcohol, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Xanthan Gum, Apricot Kernel Amino Acids, Alkanna Tinctoria Root Extract, Beta-Glucan, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Brassica Oleracea Capitata Leaf (Cabbage) Extract, Ipomoea Batatas Root Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Hydrolyzed Corn Protein, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Fragaria Ananassa (Strawberry) Fruit Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Pyrus Communis (Pear) Fruit Extract, Cucumis Melo (Melon) Seed Extract, Iris Florentina Root Extract, Vetiveria Zizanoides Root Extract, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Strawberry BHA Pore-Smooth Blur Drops: .To treat and refine pores over time: .-Evenly spread a pea-size amount onto clean skin with your fingers, gently patting product in. -Follow with moisturizer. ..To blur pores and prime skin: .-Use as the last step of your skincare routine to help control oil and create a satin-smooth base for makeup application. .-Allow to absorb fully before applying any makeup. .-Best applied with fingers. ..Watermelon Glow Pink Juice Oil-Free Moisturizer: .-After serum, smooth a dime-size amount onto clean skin morning and night. .-Gently pat into skin until fully absorbed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really leaves a glow to your skin that is only caught when you are at your best

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the blurring drops pill on my skin, even with the tiniest amount. I am highly disappointed because I have loved the other Glow recipe products that I've used. it also has a little after smell that I find unpleasant. zero out of ten for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This set is a really good value. Itu2019s a great way to try some glow recipe products (full size blue drops and mini watermelon moisturizer). I was disappointed though, the blur drops do nothing to minimize pores or reduce shine. The moisturizer is also heavily scented which is not good for people with sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Worth you money! Definitely a buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just received this in the mail and it is way smaller than I expected. The moisturizer is about the size of my hand and the drops are a bit smaller than the moisturizer. They both smell so good but seriously these things are soooo pricey!!!

reviews.review_title: do not buy for sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this broke me out so bad. i however break out easy but the sent was very strong and i had high hopes for this product as it is the first glow recipe things i have got. reidams

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone
reviews.review_text: These two products helped with my dry skin and looked stunning underneath my makeup totally buying both in the bigger size. Would totally recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this as my base before applying makeup, sooo good I recommend. Leaves your skin glowing and makeup doesnu2019t cake!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was kind of a double u201cwowu201d moment. I wasnu2019t expecting the instant satisfaction and look of my skin with both products. The moisturizer gave me plumped glow and it smelled amazing, the serum gave me this velvet smooth look. Itu2019s something that i look forward to using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t really like the blur serum it smells really weird

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The moisturizer is a perfect travel size and a very hydrating product. I wanted to use the blur drops for a couple writing my review. I can actually tell a difference under my makeup and they seem to minimize my pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The blurring drops break me out and doesnu2019t work great as a primer. Havenu2019t used the moisturizer much but it is meh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the blur drops are the best things IN THE WHOLE WORLD i use them as primer and they make my skin so good, the moisturizer works but it smells like rotten watermelons instead of fresh ones (no hate) but its a good deal if you want both

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this set is amazing, literally amazing, it is so hydrating, and makes your makeup look so smooth. Also the packaging is to die for, it's so cute

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s fine. I found the pore smoothing serum to be extremely clogging to my skin. The moisturizer was alright, itu2019s lightweight. It may be nice base layer before makeup. I donu2019t love it, but itu2019s alright

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i was going to get only the poor smoothing blue drops, but i found this set for only $5 more and thought it would be worth it. here is my review: the pore smoothing blur drops are amazing! they work great as a primer, and also just alone! the moisturizer is very hydrating- i recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily/combination skin and this brand overall is just a lifesaver. I have a lot of pores and this helped me get rid of them and made my skin so smooth. Literally after a week and a half it worked so well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love the moisturizer, but the strawberry blur drops are kinda gross lol. It stinks, and doesnu2019t smell fruity at all. Kinda like rotting fruit maybe. I noticed it started pilling off while drying and my face was covered in white pieces of (?). I expected a lot better considering how overpriced and possibly overhyped this brand is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love these products so much but the packaging for the blur drops is awful. iu2019ve used it once bc it all exploded out of the container itu2019s in so thereu2019s no product left.

reviews.review_title: the only thing that helps my bumps!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this is amazing i do not have many pimples but i do have loads of small bumps on my face and the pore smoothing drops made them go away in UNDER two weeks absolutely love and will be repurchasing! 10000000000000/10

reviews.review_title: A must in your skincare routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m completely obsessed with this it makes my skin so glowy and feel great 100% would recommend to all skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this set for the price and the moisturizer is a very good product that smells and feels amazing. I cannot tell if the blurring serum helps or not. Nothing noticeable on my uneven texture with large pores skin. Not the miracle I hoped for, but donu2019t regret the purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just returned it not worth it did nothing for my skin used it for a month

reviews.review_title: The blue drops works good as a primer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product it it so good and I love the products I got from it. A little bit pricy but I still love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love!!! I saw a big difference in my skin when I started using this. This combo makes my skin looking smooth and has that blurring effect. I have oily skin and this product truly made a difference for me. Definitely going for the bigger versions after these run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this kid. It saves $12 and both products are really great size. The blur really help my in the moisturizer is so lightweight and good but also  hydrating ufffc
Just opened this and have not used it a single time and this is all the product you get. Itu2019s half empty and supposed to be u201cfull sizeu201d. No.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My box was missing the smoothing drops and when I tried to return they wouldnu2019t let me. I was very disappointed because if I just wanted the blur drops I could have saved money. So disappointed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! I really like both of these products because the pink juice is very moisturizing and the blue drops feel great on my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This Glow Recipe set is amazing! Both of these products leave my skin looking/feeling hydrated and glowy. Plus the strawberry and watermelon combo smells so good. Definitely recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this duo! It seems pricey but really worth the money. I have already seen results in my pores with the strawberry drops! ud83cudf53

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t realize it one is a u201cprimeru201d.  I wouldnu2019t recommend this product

BEWARE! These blur drops come less than half emptyu2026i put my blur drops against my vanity light out of curiosity and found there is very little product in the pod it comes in. I went into Sephora to exchange it for a new one thinking i just got a returned item sold to me BUT NO. Me and the employee went through every single box on the shelves and she even went to check the boxes in the back.. ALL OF THEM HAVE LESS THAN HALF OF THE PRODUCT! Even the individual selling blur drops... idk what is going on and if glow recipe is ripping people off but you do NOT get 1fl.oz !!! I ended up returning the item and getting my money back. Super disappointing. CHECK YOUR PRODUCTS!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just canu2019t get over the smell of these! They smell soooo good! I love using the blur drops as a makeup primer. The moisturizer is a really good one if you have oiler skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This duo is absolutely great, I love it because it works very well on my combination skin,  I am a girl who does not wear makeup all the time and that is why I look for skincare that leaves me with soft and beautiful skin and this duo is perfect for those occasions!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the IT summer skin duo for all my oily skin girls! I get two of my fave summertime skincare products in a bundle! The blur drops are a must with or without makeup, it keeps my skin looking fresh and oil-free all day! Works great under makeup and works great on its own as well! It also over time makes the pores shrink and give the skin that smooth look. The oil-free moisturizer is super lightweight and gel-like which I love because it absorbs beautifully into my skin and feels like skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this duo! It seems pricey but really worth the money. I have already seen results in my pores with the strawberry drops! ud83cudf53

reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t realize it one is a u201cprimeru201d.  I wouldnu2019t recommend this product
